Quiz.question:
1 Part II: Executing the Response Select the correct answer, then click Done. To determine acceptable exposure limits, compare the Total Effective Dose Equivalents for the general public and personnel who spent a one-year rotation at the camp by answering each question.

Based on the measurements (0.15 mR/hr), what is the estimated dose for personnel who spent a one-year rotation at the camp? 1.2 mR 438 mR 1,314 mR 2
